Technical Support for Distributed Synthetic Operations and Integration (TBIPS)
==============================================================

# Tender Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-808-2378613
*   **Solicitation Number**: W6431-25-0172
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-11-14
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-11-29T14:00:00

# Project Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for the provision of technical support for distributed synthetic operations and integration (TBIPS). The successful bidder shall provide one (1) Level 3 Technology Architect and one (1) Level 3 Operations Support Specialist to support the Exercise and Simulation (E&S) branch of the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) Aerospace Warfare Centre (AWC).

The RCAF requires an individual with expertise in modelling and simulation (M&S) technologies and one (1) specialist with experience in Distributed Synthetic Operations Centre (DSOC) systems. The selected Resources will support the exploitation of the E&S-designed and operated Defence Secure Simulation and Training Node infrastructure (DSSTNi) Information System (IS).

# Procurement Requirements

The Procurement details are as follows:

*   **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
*   **Trade Agreements**: The solicitation is open to suppliers from Canada and the following countries:

    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Ottawa

# Accessing the RFP

The Request for Proposal (RFP) package can be downloaded from the Canada Buy Service at the following address:

<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51782/w6431-25-0172-tbips_npp-eng.pdf>

Note: An HTML version of the RFP will not be provided. All proposals must be submitted in Word format or PDF.

Bidder inquiries should be directed to: Leanne Coopertel: (613) 392-2811 / lean
